title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 99
Gazette dated Friday, 20th March, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.23 OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government
By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 3) Order, 2020
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local
Title
GovernmentBy-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)(No.
3)Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and
Dateand
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the timeof
nomination
returning officer on Thursday, 19th March, 2020, between 0900
forelection
hoursand1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 19th
Campaign
March,2020,at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonWednesday, period
1stApril,2020.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand
Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 2nd andtimesof
poll
April,2020,between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninadistrictandwardifonlyone
candidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
100 StatutoryInstruments 20thMarch,2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs2and4)
ELECTIONSFORCOUNCILLOR

Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 18th day of

JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
